title: SPX: "I Don't Look Like Her": Race, Resemblance, and Relationships in Multiracial Families
description: Dr. Chandra Waring discusses her article," 'I Don't Look Like Her': Race, Resemblance, and Relationships in Multiracial Families,” co-authored by Dr. Samit Bordoloi. The article is published in the April 2019 issue of Sociological Perspectives.
content:encoded: Dr. Chandra Waring discusses her article," 'I Don't Look Like Her': Race, Resemblance, and Relationships in Multiracial Families,” co-authored by Dr. Samit Bordoloi. The article is published in the April 2019 issue of Sociological Perspectives.
